about_the_game:
CREATIVE MODE

Dive into a tranquil realm of boundless creativity with our Creative Mode. Step into a world where your imagination sets the course – sculpt landscapes, erect monumental structures, craft intricate houses, or even breathe life into colossal characters; the possibilities are exclusively yours to define. Unleash your artistic spirit, design awe-inspiring monuments, and then proudly showcase your creations, inviting others to marvel at your ingenuity.

WORLD GENERATION

Craft unique worlds using an innovative generation system that offers a spectrum of sizes, allowing quick circumnavigations to weeks-long odysseys. These procedurally generated worlds feature cold polar biomes, scorching equatorial deserts, large continents to conquer, and charming clusters of islands dotting deep blue oceans – creating a vast scope for exploration and survival.

WHERE WE ARE HEADING

  • Embark on a journey of discovery after awakening in a mysterious new world teeming with opportunities, challenges and hidden dangers. Explore and gather essential resources to construct shelters to ensure survival and success.

  • Forge tools that enable you to dig deep into the earth, unearthing hidden treasures and uncovering ancient secrets. Gather precious materials and grow crafting prowess, which leads to the ability to fashion increasingly advanced gear that opens up new horizons of exploration.

  • Choose a destiny – tame the planet and its mysteries, or become the ultimate explorer by designing and building an interplanetary spaceship capable of taking you to the stars.

  • Dive into a tranquil realm of boundless creativity with Creative Mode. Step into a world where imagination sets the course – sculpt landscapes, erect monumental structures, craft intricate houses, or even breathe life into colossal characters; the possibilities are ready and waiting to be defined. Unleash artistic spirit, design awe-inspiring monuments, and then proudly showcase any creations, inviting others to marvel at these displays of ingenuity.

name: PlanetSmith

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an adventure in PlanetSmith, a spherical world sandbox game offering unique exploration and creative building. Journey into procedurally generated voxel worlds that defy conventional limits of block building. Showcase your artistic touch on your own spherical canvas.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
